affiliations.institution: Max Planck Institute for Evolutionary Biology

title: Concerning RNA-guided gene drives for the alteration of wild populations
impact-statement: Combining CRISPR/Cas9 genome editing with gene drives may enable scientists to reversibly edit the genomes of diverse wild populations, an advance that could help eliminate diseases, support sustainable agriculture, and control invasive species.
